climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: Easy-peasy Natural Baby Wipes - 72-count natural organic baby wipes in a handy flip-top pack so you can grab wipes with just one hand. The perfect fragrance-free wipes for hands, faces, and bottoms

Newborn Baby Essentials - While other newborn wipes contain synthetics and other harsh ingredients that can cause irritation, MADE OF Soothing Wipes use only natural and organic ingredients that are safe for baby’s delicate skin – such as soothing organic Aloe Vera and Vitamin E. Our wipes are soaked in a calming, plant-based solution with nourishing oils, moisturizing sensitive skin instead of stripping away its natural moisture

70% Organic / 30% Natural Ingredients - We’ve carefully selected the ingredients in our organic wipes to formulate the most calming, nourishing, and thoroughly cleansing unscented wipes you can find for your baby. Our diaper wipes sensitive contain organic Argan Oil and organic glycerin to help baby’s skin to retain moisture, and lavender oil to soothe uncomfortable red skin

Naturally Fragrance Free - Unlike other baby cleaning wipes that are fragrance-free but end up having a strong odor, our wipes for babies are truly fragrance free. That means zero synthetic fragrances or artificial ingredients. Our unscented baby wipes are also alcohol-free and chemical-free

What is Ultimate Transparency? - Many brands make claims, but we backs ours up with test results for all baby organic products. MADE OF fragrance free baby wipes are non-GMO, soy & nut-free, phthalate-free, paraben-free and sulfate-free, with no artificial ingredients. NSF Organic Standard Certified, EWG Verified and USA-made. Every product is dermatologist and pediatrician recommended, backed up with test results for every product. Because parents have the right to know

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Chemical-free and Alcohol-free for Your Baby's Sensitive Skin Regular baby wipes – and even those marked “sensitive skin” – often contain chemicals and harsh ingredients that irritate your little one’s skin. At MADE OF, we wanted to create wipes that were truly soothing, nourishing, and 100% chemical-free. Our soft, durable Soothing Baby Wipes are soaked in a plant-based solution enriched with calming ingredients like organic Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to comfort sensitive skin and prevent irritation and rashes. We carefully choose all-natural, organic ingredients to be able to offer baby wipes that are soothing and nourishing while still cleansing effectively. Our wipes contain organic glycerin & Vitamin E-rich organic argan oil which help baby’s skin to retain its moisture, while lavender oil helps to soothe. Works great paired with our Organic Diaper Rash Cream & The Better Diaper to help to protect against diaper rash.

Truly Unscented - Zero Synthetic Fragrances While other baby wipes claim to be unscented, only to emit a strong, artificial scent once out of the package, we've formulated our wipes to be truly fragrance-free. We’re proud to offer baby wipes with absolutely zero synthetic fragrances or artificial ingredients.

What is Ultimate Transparency? Exactly what it sounds like. Many companies make claims, MADE OF backs ours up. Our organic baby wipes are: EWG VerifiedOrganic CertifiedVeganLeaping Bunny Certified Non-GMOPhthalate-FreeParaben-FreeSulfate-FreeDermatologist ApprovedPediatrician ApprovedOnly Manufactured in U.S. Factories For every claim we make, we supply test results, ingredients, and certifications for every single product. Because parents have the right to know.

Greenwashing: Vital Education Every Parent Needs Greenwashing means using language loopholes to give a false impression of products so they sound more environmentally sound than they are. In skincare, this is rampant. “Natural” is just a marketing term. The fact is, skincare isn’t regulated like food is, so clever marketers can manipulate language so their products sound more desirable. "Made in USA" can mean just bottled in the US, while ingredients are sourced from countries with lower standards. But while even honesty is manipulated, MADE OF stands for Ultimate Transparency, providing real evidence to back up our “Natural” & “Organic” claims.

The MADE OF Crusade At MADE OF, we set out to solve the greenwashing problem of brands misrepresenting how green or safe their baby care products were. While other baby care companies are honest, we are truly transparent, with uncompromising values in line with your own values as a parent. It starts with core values & from there, the ingredients follow. If they don’t meet our standards, we don’t sell them. Period. MADE OF means Made Better. Made Safer. Made with Nothing to Hide.

Bath & Body A safer, greener cleansing routine for baby that won’t irritate baby’s skin or your own. MADE OF Organic Foaming Baby Shampoo, Body Wash & Organic Foaming Hand Soap are gentle enough for baby but effective enough for you & the rest of your family. Wash away dirt without the harsh chemicals of other cleansers. Cleaning Clean without the chemicals. Create a truly safe, clean environment for your baby and your family by eliminating harsh, chemical-based cleaners from your home along with the hazards, noxious fumes, and residues they bring with them. Skin Care Baby personal care products made without ingredients and chemicals found to irritate the skin. Because your baby deserves only the most pure skin care products without added fillers and artificial ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ...that ticks all the boxes and does its job. Easy to use, these wipes are really scent free and cruelty free, and do the job. Who would have thought it's difficult to find wipes that do what they need to do, and are reasonably priced? Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organic, soothing, reasonably priced
reviews.reviewText: With all the health fears and shortages, I was compelled to search for an alternative to my go-to baby wipes. Good thing, because I wouldnt have otherwise found these wipes. While a bit pricier than my ordinary wipes, well worth it for the value and peace of mind. You know you're getting a high-quality product the second the wipe touches your fingertips-- non-irritating and soothing for those with allergies and sensitive skin (yes even adults). And they don't price-gouge and delivered in a timely basis. That alone was worth the five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked like all the rest we use but got here when needed.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived ahead of schedule and worked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just tried one pack of these and a ordered another I like that they are a cleaner wipe for my baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Bought for our little guy who has extremely sensitive skin & eczema. These are some of the best wipes we have found. 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wipes stuck together, do not dispense properly
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are not bad at all. The major issue is that the wipes would never come out one after the next. I would always pull two or 3 wipes at once. the wipes are not well aligned as in other famous wipe brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very mild, comforting to the skin
reviews.reviewText: I use the product personally for a light “sponge bath” after gardening or other activities when a full shower may not be necessary or convenient. Easy to pop a couple wipes in a ziploc bag back in the day when I could go to the gym.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These wipes truly work!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted organic wipes that would not irritate, sting or burn yet still do their job without tearing or shredding. These wipes came thru for me....thank u!!!
